description:
In this video course, I'll teach you about the physiological demands of the marathon distance, the three most critical systems you need to target, with specific workouts, how long and what pace your long runs should be, show you sample weeks and months of our training program and help you execute the perfect taper and race strategy.

You also get a training plan tailored to your specific mileage level, training history and that includes SPECIFIC training paces based on your goal.

If you want to avoid the most common marathon training mistakes and ensure you get the most from your training, this is a must watch course and an absolute must training plan.
title: Marathon Training Plan and Course
